posts.description: ‘Shame. Shame.’ N.H. lawmaker resigns after outcry over his ‘woman-hating’ Reddit forum - The Washington Post
posts.extended: The beginning of the end for Rep. Robert Fisher, a New Hampshire state lawmaker, took root just three weeks ago, when an investigation by the Daily Beast chronicled in painstaking detail years of anonymous, “misogynistic” and “woman-hating” Reddit posts from the user pk_atheist.

posts.description: Leaked Chat Logs Purport to Show 'Deep State' Planting Anti-Trump Stories With Media » Alex Jones' Infowars: There's a war on for your mind!
posts.extended: Images purportedly circulating on the “dark web” show unidentified individuals alleged to be members of the intelligence community scheming on how to plant stories with the media to embarrass President Trump.
